subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2646 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Dietmar Stein,    We apologize to inform you that your package appears to be lost. We will immediately resend it and investigate the matter.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045916098277

Hi

Thanks for information.

It is not urgent, but I wondered about shipment status not changing.

Regards,

Dietmar Stein

Solutions based on Linux

Am Kleinenberg 16
55444 Schweppenhausen

phone: +49 175 19 12 767
mail:contact@dietmarstein.com
www.:https://dietmarstein.com

Hi Dietmar Stein,    Thank you for your understanding. The logistics provider has reported the package as lost, which is why there have been no tracking updates. We have already reshipped your order, and you should see a new tracking update today.
